articles.title: Trump says he's optimistic about a trade deal with Europe - NPR
articles.description: The remarks came in a meeting with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, the first EU leader to meet directly with Trump since the president imposed — and then scaled back — a 20% tariff on EU imports.
